page.shortlink: api client api string trimchars method

argument.name: part
argument.description: The part of the string to trim.

return.name: value
return.description: The value of the string with the characters removed.

page.description: Extension to the native string variable to trim characters from the start and/or end of the string.

discussion.p: The String.trimChars method can be used to trim characters from the start and/or end of a string.

The "part" argument can be "start" or "left" to trim from the start of the string, or "end" or "right" to trim from the end of the string. A value of "all" can be used to trim from both sides of the string.
